en.WELCOME_MSG: Welcome to Speech Therapy Practice. Which of the following alphabets do you want to focus on today? {} Please tell me which option number do you want to practice today.
en.WELCOME_REPROMPT_MSG: Alphabet options are: {} I want to practice option one. What do you want to practice today?
en.ALPHABET_OPTIONS_REPEAT_MSG: Alphabet options are: {} Please tell me which option number do you want to practice today.
en.PRACTICE_TYPE_MSG: Great! Let's practice letter {}. Do you want to work with {}?
en.PRACTICE_TYPE_REPROMPT_MSG: What do you want to work with, {}?
en.START_SESSION_MSG: So we'll practice {} today. You could change alphabet option or practice type at any point of time. Say start my session to proceed.
en.CREATE_PRACTICE_MSG: Topic selected is {}. Am I correct?
en.TOPIC_MISSING_MSG: What do you want to practice today?
en.START_PRACTICE_MSG: Please say the word 'Speech' and then repeat after me: {}
en.VALIDATION_INCORRECT_USER_SENTENCE: Your said {}. Let's try again! Please say the word 'Speech' and then repeat after me: {}
en.VALIDATION_CORRECT_USER_SENTENCE: Awesome! That was correct. Do you want to quit or continue?
en.WELCOME_BACK_MSG: Welcome back. It looks like there is {} day until your {}th birthday.
en.WELCOME_BACK_MSG_plural: Welcome back. It looks like there are {} days until your {}th birthday.
en.REGISTER_BIRTHDAY_MSG: Thanks, I'll remember that you were born {} {} {}.
en.HELP_MSG: You can tell me your date of birth and I'll take note. You can also just say, 'register my birthday' and I will guide you. Which one would you like to try?
en.ERROR_MSG: Sorry, I couldn't understand what you said. Can you reformulate?
en.ERROR_TIMEZONE_MSG: I can't determine your timezone. Please check your device settings and make sure a timezone was selected. After that please reopen the skill and try again!
